closed_reason: Implemented stale ownership detection in mb doctor with configurable threshold
design: Detect and handle cases where an agent claims a task but never completes it. Options: timeout-based expiry, manual reclaim command, or doctor --fix to clear stale claims.
notes: Depends on ownership tracking. Consider: How long before ownership is stale? Should we track last activity timestamp?
title: Handle stale ownership when agent abandons task
